title: Consolidate configuration into single source of truth
description: Eliminate configuration fragmentation by consolidating .jit/labels.json into .jit/config.toml, removing misleading namespace strategic flags, and enabling API-driven configuration for web UI. Add missing validation settings (default_type, require_type_label, label_regex) and provide migration tooling for existing repos. This refactoring eliminates duplicate hierarchy data, clarifies that strategic classification is type-based only, and ensures single source of truth for all configuration.
